title: Highlander/Romance/Time Travel ebooks (epub and mobi) KiwiSue49
description:
Angeline Fortin (4 books)

  A Laird for All Time (15 Nov 2011)
  A Time & Place for Every Laird (7 May 2013)
  My Heart's in the Highlands (19 Dec 2012)
  Nothing But Time (31 Jan 2012)



Anita Clenney (3 books)

  Awaken the Highland Warrior (Connor Clan #1) (3 May 2011)
  Embrace the Highland Warrior (Connor Clan #2) (1 Nov 2011)
  Faelan: A Highland Warrior Brief (Connor Clan Prequel) (17 Dec 2013)



Catherine Bybee (5 books)

  Binding Vows (MacCoinnich Time Travels #1) (2009)
  Silent Vows (MacCoinnich Time Travels #2) (2010)
  Redeeming Vows (MacCoinnich Time Travels #3) (2010)
  Highland Shifter (MacCoinnich Time Travels #4) (2012)
  Highland Protector (MacCoinnich Time Travels #5) (2013)



Ceci Giltenan (2 books)

  Highland Courage (Highland Brides) (2 Mar 2014)
  Highland Solution (highland Brides) (2 Sep 2013)



Debbie Mazzuca (1 books)

  Lord of The Isles (12 Mar 2010)



Eliza Knight (4 books)

  The Highlander's Conquest (The Stolen Bride Series #2) (19 Sep 2012)
  The Highlander's Reward (The Stolen Bride Series #1) (11 Jul 2012)
  The Highlander's Sin (The Stolen Bride Series #6) (19 Oct 2013)
  The Highlander's Temptation (The Stolen Bride Series Prequel) (21 Feb 2014)



J. A. Templeton (3 books)

  The Deepest Cut (MacKinnon Curse #1) (18 Dec 2013)
  The Haunted (MacKinnon Curse #2) (8 Jan 2012)
  The MacKinnon Curse (The Beginning) (30 Jul 2012)



Lily Baldwin (2 books)

  Highland Thunder (Isle of Mull sequel) (11 Jan 2014)
  To Bewitch a Highlander (Isle of Mull) (15 Jan 2014)



Sarah Woodbury (4 books)

  Daughter of Time (The After Cilmeri Series Prequel) (18 Mar 2011)
  Footsteps in Time (The After Cilmeri Series #1) (15 Mar 2011) 
  Prince of Time (The After Cilmeri Series #2) (22 Jan 2011)
  Winds of Time (The After Cilmeri Series novella #1.5) (29 Feb 2012)



Victoria Roberts (3 books)

  Temptation in a Kilt (Bad Boys of the Highlands #1) (4 Sep 2012)
  To Wed a Wicked Highlander (Bad Boys of the Highlands #3) (3 Sep 2013)
  X Marks the Scot (Bad Boys of the Highlands #2) (5 Feb 2013)




Note 1: Author and book title names in alphabetical order.
Note 2: Dates in brackets are release date details from either Amazon or goodreads
 (good places to refer to for plot and reviews)
Note 3: Converted original azw file type into epub and mobi using Calibre 1.36
Note 4: Have tested all 62 files using Kindle (mobi) and Aldiko (epub) applications
 on Samsung Note 10.1.
Note 5: Used import option with Aldiko, and copy pasted the mobi files
 directly into the Kindle folder in the onboard SD card.
 Had to do a refresh so that  Kindle would show the books in its Library.
Note 6: A couple of the above were free at the time of purchase on Amazon
 That was the way I got started on some of the authors.
